physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on front of photograph: ''Allied Mercantile Division plans their dinner.'' Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Allied; Merc. Div.; Allied - Advertising and Merc. Div.; Front L. to R. Howard Kaplan, Harold Leventhal, merch ch., Joe Kahn, Jack Levinson, Retailing Ch., Harry Vacas, Eugene Alpert; Standing L. to R. Jerry Jacobs, Harold Kapelovitz, Sanford Alpert, Trades Co-Ch., Ernest Cassell, Morton Margolin, Irwin Levy.''

mods.abstract: Members of the Allied Jewish Federation Merchantile Division pose together. Front row left to right Howard Kaplan, Harold Leventhal - Merchantile Chairman, Joe Kahn, Jack Levinson - Retailing Chairman, Harry Vacas, Eugene Alpert and standing in the back row left to right Jerry Jacobs, Harold Kapelovitz, Sanford Alpert - Trades Co-Chairman, Ernest Cassell, Morton Margolin, and Irwin Levy.
